page.title: 11CAMBORNE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: {The leisure centre stages international & national competitions. They also provide{lessons}in different sports such as swimming,canoeing,etc. The most popular day of the week is Wednesday & the most popular sport is badminton. Schools use the centre mainly for badminton, swimming, table tennis, and squash facilities. The leisure centre get a fair amount of{holiday-makers}particularly if the weather is bad.Local groups use the leisure centre. The leisure centre is also used by visiting theatre groups eg.the{Royal {Shakespeare Assocciation}and orchestras eg{.B.S.O.
